name: Jrrey
description: Jrrey lets your visitors control your Website with Voice Commands.
features: A lightweight library makes it easier to add Speech Recognition to your Websites.
Jrrey understands commands with named Variables and Optional words (using RegExp).
Jrrey plays nicely with all browsers and doesn't have side effects on unsupported Browsers.

name: Kind of Adobe
description: Browser based Image editor in Vanilla JS.
features: Supports multiple Image Filters and Effects.
Your Image stays in your browser, no data is transmitted over the Internet.

name: jSpeaker
description: A Javascript Text to Speech (TTS) library.
features: Makes use of Browser's built-in Web Speech API to convert Text to Speech.
Latency to convert Text to Speech can be avoided if the browser supports Web Speech API.
